name: UbeswapPriceProvider
description: UbeswapPriceProvider. A contract that maps asset to its Ubeswap price feed and provide a function to get aset price.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when a user has withdrawn.

eventDecorators.name: PriceFeedUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when a user has withdrawn.

functionDecorators.name: getAssetPrice
functionDecorators.description: Gets an asset price by address.

functionDecorators.name: getPriceFeed
functionDecorators.description: Gets the address of the price feed for an asset address.

returnDecorators.description: address The address of the price feed.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: updatePriceFeed
functionDecorators.description: Sets the price feed for an asset.

parameterDecorators.name: _priceFeed
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the price feed.
